abstract: Shibuya Ward district in central Tokyo plans to recognize same-sex couples, giving them same legal rights as married opposite-sex couples; becomes first local government in Japan to do so at a time when issue of gay marriage is stirring in many countries.
lead_paragraph: Leaders in the Shibuya area unveiled a draft of a new statute on Thursday and said it was expected to be approved in a local assembly vote next month.

headline.main: District in Tokyo Plans to Extend Rights of Gay Couples
